title: Bastian Solutions Shares Seven Helpful Tips for Selecting Food Grade Conveyors
text:
Bastian Solutions’ Field Applications Engineer, Austin Trusty, discussed conveyor systems’ critical role in the food processing and manufacturing industry, on the company blog. Trusty noted that conveyor technology is changing rapidly and compiles a short list of items to consider when making a food grade conveyor selection.
· Ease of Cleaning: This is likely the most important topic to consider.
· Ease of Maintenance: Uptime and maintenance downtime can greatly affect the cycle time.
· Investment: Investment in food grade conveyor stretches beyond the initial purchase over the lifespan of the system.
· Life Span: Choosing plastic versus stainless conveyor affects longevity.
· Configuration Flexibility: A conveyor system that is easily adaptable to your needs is highly valuable in the long run.
· Safety: Keeping moving parts and pinch points to a minimum is ideal in conveyor safety. The less moving parts the better safety outlook.
· Support: It is important to partner with a supplier that will assist with after-sale support.
